amendatorysection.catchline: Discovery of additional evidence; notify other party and court.
amendatorysection.para: If, subsequent to compliance with an order for discovery under the provisions of sections 29-1912 to 29-1921, and prior to or during trial, a party discovers additional material which he would have been under a duty to disclose or produce at the time of such previous compliance, he shall promptly notify the other party or his attorney and the court of the existence of the additional material.
